end-bier-address.description: The end-bier address of BIER IPv6 for current SD.

load-balance-num.description: Maximum number of paths for multicast load balancing.

bsl.description: BIER BitString length, which is 64/128/256 bits. Multiple devices in a subdomain must have the same BSL.

igp-sub-process-id.description: Sub-process ID of the underlay routing protocol.
